snippet: The super PAC backing Gov. Bobby Jindal, who was relegated to the second-tier debate panel on Thursday in Cleveland, will broadcast an ad on Fox News in Iowa during the main event.
abstract: The super PAC backing Gov. Bobby Jindal, who was relegated to the second-tier debate panel on Thursday in Cleveland, will broadcast an ad on Fox News in Iowa during the main event.

headline.main: As Debate Goes On Without Bobby Jindal, Super PAC’s Ad Will Support Him in Iowa
